node.name: Remote Project Properties Plug-in
node.shortdescription: The Remote Project Properties Plug-in provides functionality to configure projects within the workspace using a a very simple, shell script like command file. The so called Eclipse Project Configuration Script (EPCS) files are fetched over HTTP or from a local location. The commands supported include creation of directories, deletion of directories and files and a file download.
node.body: The Remote Project Properties Plug-in provides functionality to configure projects within the workspace using a a very simple, shell script like command file. The so called Eclipse Project Configuration Script (EPCS) files are fetched over HTTP or from a local location. The commands supported include creation of directories, deletion of directories and files and a file download.
